data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in high up the field for Eibar in Eibar.
In the minute 2, Goncalo Guedes for Valencia drives towards goal at Ipurua Municipal Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Valencia advance rapidly upfield but Xavier Estrada Fernandez blows for offside.
Free kick for Valencia in their own half.
In the minute 3, Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Eibar in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Valencia goal kick.
Can Valencia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Eibar's half?
In the minute 5, Ball safe as Valencia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Valencia to take a throw-in in Eibar territory.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards Eibar a goal kick.
In the minute 6, It's a goal kick for the home team in Eibar.
Valencia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Valencia are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 8, Throw-in Valencia.
Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Eibar in their own half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Eibar at Ipurua Municipal Stadium.
Throw-in for Eibar in the half of Valencia.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a Eibar throw-in in Valencia's half.
In the minute 14, Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Eibar.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
In the minute 16, Ball safe as Valencia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a Valencia throw-in in Eibar's half.
In the minute 18, Valencia to take a throw-in in Eibar territory.
Throw-in for Valencia in their own half.
Corner awarded to Eibar.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Eibar at Ipurua Municipal Stadium.
Can Valencia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Eibar's half?
Eibar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 23, Valencia have a dangerous throw-in.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards the home team a throw-in.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a throw-in for Valencia, close to Eibar's area.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Eibar in their own half.
Sergio Alvarez for Eibar gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Valencia at Ipurua Municipal Stadium.
In the minute 26, Throw-in Valencia.
Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Eibar awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Valencia at Ipurua Municipal Stadium.
Eibar have a goal kick.
Valencia have a goal kick.
In the minute 31, Free kick for Valencia in the half of Eibar.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Eibar in their own half.
Valencia push upfield but Xavier Estrada Fernandez quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Valencia in their own half.
Eibar's Kike is on target but unsuccessful.
In Eibar, Valencia push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 35, Can Eibar capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Valencia's half?
Eibar's Edu Exposito gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards Valencia a goal kick.
In the minute 36, In Eibar a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Eibar in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Valencia goal kick.
In the minute 37, Eibar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
In Eibar Eibar attack through Edu Exposito. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 39, Goal kick for Valencia at Ipurua Municipal Stadium.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Eibar.
In the minute 41, Eibar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Valencia.
At Ipurua Municipal Stadium, Esteban Burgos has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 42, Attention is being given to Valenciaâ€™s Manu Vallejo and play has been suspended briefly.
Valencia's Daniel Wass gets in a shot on goal at Ipurua Municipal Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick Valencia.
In the minute 44, Eibar's Anaitz Arbilla has been booked in Eibar.
Manu Vallejo is back on his feet again.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Eibar.
Throw-in for Valencia in the half of Eibar.
The first-half is over at Ipurua Municipal Stadium.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Ipurua Municipal Stadium.
Free kick for Valencia in their own half.
Eibar awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 49, Eibar have been awarded a corner by Xavier Estrada Fernandez.
Ball safe as Valencia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Eibar in the half of Valencia.
In the minute 50, Eibar's Kike breaks free at Ipurua Municipal Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Valencia have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Eibar in their own half.
In the minute 52, Ball safe as Eibar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball goes out of play for a Valencia goal kick.
In Eibar Valencia drive forward through Uros Racic. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 54, Corner awarded to Eibar.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Eibar.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a Eibar throw-in in Valencia's half.
In the minute 56, Eibar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Eibar a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Uros Racic (Valencia) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 58, Can Eibar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Valencia's half?
Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards Valencia a goal kick.
Valencia to take a throw-in in Eibar territory.
In the minute 62, Xavier Estrada Fernandez waits before resuming play because Gabriel Paulista for Valencia is still down.
Throw-in Eibar.
Valencia's Gabriel Paulista looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 64, Yoshinori Muto of Eibar gets in a strike, but is off target.
Eibar have been awarded a corner by Xavier Estrada Fernandez.
Goal kick for Valencia at Ipurua Municipal Stadium.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Valencia at Ipurua Municipal Stadium.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards the home team a throw-in.
Valencia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 67, Eibar are coming forward and Kike gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Valencia goal kick.
Edu Exposito gets his shot on target but fails to score for Eibar.
In the minute 69, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Valencia in their own half.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Eibar in their own half.
Sergio Alvarez (Eibar) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Alejandro Pozo is on a sub for Takashi Inui for Eibar.
Kevin Gameiro is replacing Manu Vallejo for the away team.
In the minute 70, Valencia make their second substitution with Jason replacing Yunus Musah.
Throw-in for Valencia at Ipurua Municipal Stadium.
Free kick for Valencia in the half of Eibar.
In the minute 73, In Eibar, Eliaquim Mangala (Valencia) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Eibar.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
In the minute 75, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Valencia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Eibar in their own half.
In the minute 76, Play has been interrupted briefly in Eibar to check on Alejandro Pozo, who is grimacing with pain.
The match at Ipurua Municipal Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Lato Toni, who is down injured.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Valencia.
In the minute 78, Lato Toni has recovered and rejoins the match in Eibar.
Eibar's Alejandro Pozo is back in action after a slight knock.
Throw-in for Valencia in the half of Eibar.
In the minute 80, Eibar have been awarded a corner by Xavier Estrada Fernandez.
At Ipurua Municipal Stadium, Valencia are penalized for being offside.
Free kick Valencia.
In the minute 82, Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards the away team a throw-in.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
Jose Luis Mendilibar is making the team's second substitution at Ipurua Municipal Stadium with Sergi Enrich replacing Yoshinori Muto.
Eibar to take a throw-in in Valencia territory.
Can Eibar capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 84, Javi Gracia (Valencia) is making a third substitution, with Thierry Correia replacing Lato Toni.
In the minute 86, Corner awarded to Eibar.
Valencia needs to be cautious. Eibar have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in Valencia.
Sergi Enrich of Eibar smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 88, The home team replace Sergio Alvarez with Recio.
Eibar's Alejandro Pozo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 89, Corner awarded to Eibar.
Sergi Enrich hits the bar! Very nearly a goal there for Eibar in Eibar.
Valencia have a goal kick.
Free kick Eibar.
At Ipurua Municipal Stadium the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Eibar have been awarded a corner by Xavier Estrada Fernandez.
Can Eibar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Valencia's half?
Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Valencia at Ipurua Municipal Stadium.
Free kick for Eibar in their own half.
Valencia drives forward and Kevin Gameiro gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Valencia close to the penalty box.
It's 0-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Maxi Gomez for Valencia has been booked by Xavier Estrada Fernandez and receives a first yellow card.
